contentrichtext.text: {{For|the commune of Nord, France|Rœulx}} {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Le Rœulx |picture=Le roeulx.jpg |picture-legend=Castle of Le Rœulx |map=Le Roeulx Hainaut Belgium Map.png |map-legend=Location of Le Rœulx in Hainaut |arms=CommunesBelgique-Le-Roeulx.svg |flag=Le Roeulx Belgium.svg |region={{BE-REG-WAL}} |community={{BE-FR}} |province={{BE-PROV-HT}} |arrondissement=[[Arrondissement of Soignies|Soignies]] |nis=55035 |pyramid-date= |0-19= |20-64= |65= |foreigners= |foreigners-date= |mayor=Benoît Friart |majority=IC |postal-codes=7070 |telephone-area=064 |web=[http://www.leroeulx.be/ www.leroeulx.be] |lat_deg=50 |lat_min=30 |lon_deg=04 |lon_min=06 }} '''Le Rœulx''' is a [[Wallonia|Walloon]] [[municipality]] located in the [[Belgium|Belgian]] province of [[Hainaut (province)|Hainaut]]. On January 1, 2006, Le Rœulx had a total population of 7,977. The total area is 42.80 km² which gives a [[population density]] of 186 inhabitants per km². The Château du Rœulx, a family seat of the [[House of Croÿ|Comtes de Croÿ-Rœulx]], is situated near the town. ==References== {{reflist}} {{commonscat|Le Roeulx|Le Rœulx}} {{Hainaut}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Le Roulx}} [[Category:Municipalities of Hainaut (province)]] {{Hainaut-geo-stub}}
